content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.93, 10.71)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 10.5, 10.5) - Status: NO_POWER
- Electricity group (position 12.93, 10.71) - Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: WORKING
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5) - Status: NORMAL

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to entity placement
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it. For example, the error occurred when trying to get a lab at position (6.0, 0.0) where no entity of type lab was found.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are properly connected to an electric network to avoid issues like "NO_POWER" status.
